idea-plugin.name: Camel Bean Navigator
idea-plugin.description:
Jump from Camel .bean() calls directly to Spring beans and methods. Speeds up navigation and debugging in integration routes.

Features

  • Go to declaration from "beanName" → @Bean method or @Service/@Component class
  • Go to declaration from "methodName(...)" → matching public method
  • Method name completion in the 2nd argument
  • Color highlight when navigation is available
idea-plugin.change-notes: 0.1.3 - Color highlight fix. 0.1.2 - Color highlight for navigable .bean() arguments (bean name / method name). 0.1.1 - Navigation is possible, even if bean declaration consists of the reference to constant. 0.1.0 - Initial release: navigation from Camel .bean() to Spring beans/methods, completion for method name.
